attributes.action: Only sell silent fireworks for public use to avoid causing distress to pets.
attributes.additional_details: This is because my pets are always experiencing distress and are petrified to go outside when they hear extremely loud noise or vibration boom created by fireworks.
attributes.background: I want the goverment to do this because pets are always afraid of fireworks in genersl and it makes pets shake in fear, causes panic or heart attacks and causes great distress for household pets aswell as poor outdoor wildlife.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

While some fireworks are marketed as silent, these still make some noise.

If you would like the Government to reduce the decibel limit to a specific level, you could start a new petition requesting this.
